about_the_game:
A versatile pack of 20 unique and original music tracks to cover various situations including battles, boss battles, towns, forests, ruins and more in RPG/JRPG and fantasy adventure games.

Features:

* 20 BGM tracks suitable for JRPG and Fantasy games!
* ogg, mp3, m4a and wav formats included
* For use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice!

Tracklist:

Conquerer Of The Tide
Duel
Journeyman's Town
Miquanae Forest
Ranger's Assault
Ruins
The Grace of Wind
Timeless Ends
Turnpoint Grange
Volcanic Pass
A Battle Awaits
Adversus
Come And Get Me
Dimension Mismatch
Festival Dance
Forge Battle Part 1
Forge Battle Part 2
Golgago Swamp
Kaiju War
Scarrid Cave

  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
